activities.title: Examine System Elements for Least Privilege Design and Implementation
activities.description: The activity and it steps will be performed by the assessor and facilitated by owner, ISSO, and product team for the IFA GoodRead system with necessary information and access about least privilege design and implementation of the system's elements: the application, web framework, server, and cloud account infrastructure.

steps.title: Obtain Network Access via VPN to IFA GoodRead Environment
steps.description: The assessor will obtain network access with appropriately configured VPN account to see admin frontend to the application for PAO staff, which is only accessible via VPN with an appropriately configured role for PAO staff accounts.

steps.title: Obtain Credentials and Access to AwesomeCloud Account for IFA GoodRead System
steps.description: The assessor will obtain access to the GoodRead Product Team's AwesomeCloud account with their single sign-on credentials to a read-only assessor role.

steps.title: Obtain Applcation Access Provided by Product Team
steps.description: The assessor will obtain non-privileged account credentials with the PAO staff role to test this role in the application does not permit excessive administrative operations.

steps.title: Confirm Load Balancer Blocks Access to Admin Frontend from Internet
steps.description: The assessor will confirm that the load balancer for public access does not allow access to Admin Frontend of the application from the Internet.

steps.title: Confirm GoodRead's PAO Role Cannot Manage Users
steps.description: The assessor will confirm that user's logged into the GoodRead Application with the PAO staff role cannot add, modify, or disable users from the system.

steps.title: Confirm Django Admin Panel Not Available
steps.description: The assessor will confirm with web-based interface and API methods users with the PAO Staff role cannot access the Django admin panel functions and interactively change application's database records.

assessment-subjects.description: The assessor for the IFA GoodRead Project, including the application and infrastructure for this information system, are within scope of this assessment.

tasks.title: Examine Least Privilege Design and Implementation
